revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot
revision.text:

==Redirect== The version of this page, at the time of the redirect, comprised a verbatim copy of various sections of [http://www.armymwr.com/commander/aboutfmwrc.aspx the AFMWRC] website. While not a direct copyright violation, since the original website is a work of the US Government or one of its branches and is therefore in the public domain, it is still improper to copy entire website contents to Wikipedia. Since the [[Morale, Welfare and Recreation]] page already has a link to the Army's MWRC command page, there is no need to duplicate the material here at Wikipedia. <font color="green">[[User:WikiDan61|WikiDan61]]</font><font color="green" size="5px"></font><sup>[[User talk:WikiDan61|ChatMe!]]</sup><sub>[[Special:Contributions/WikiDan61|ReadMe!!]]</sub> 15:22, 9 August 2010 (UTC) '''Bold text'''
== External links modified ==
Hello fellow Wikipedians,
I have just added archive links to {{plural:4|one external link|4 external links}} on [[United States Army's Family and MWR Programs]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=706831841 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20100911030122/http://www.imcom.army.mil:80/hq/about/history/ to http://www.imcom.army.mil/hq/about/history/ *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20101204033534/http://www.armymwr.com/recleisure/entertainment/soldiershow/2010_soldiershow_mediakit.aspx to http://www.armymwr.com/recleisure/entertainment/soldiershow/2010_soldiershow_mediakit.aspx *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20100514163219/http://www.goarmy.com:80/events/army_athletes/army_sports_programs.jsp to http://www.goarmy.com/events/army_athletes/army_sports_programs.jsp *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20100727165414/http://www.armymwr.com:80/sports/how_to_apply.aspx to http://www.armymwr.com/sports/how_to_apply.aspx
When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know.
{{sourcecheck|checked=false}}
Cheers.â€”[[User:Cyberbot II|<sup style="color:green;font-family:Courier">cyberbot II]]<small><sub style="margin-left:-14.9ex;color:green;font-family:Comic Sans MS">[[User talk:Cyberbot II|<span style="color:green">Talk to my owner]]:Online</sub></small> 15:08, 25 February 2016 (UTC)
